SELECT mexpend.create_time , mexpend.expend_qty , mexpend.status ,mexpend.user_id , mexpend.end_time , mexpend.after_qty , mexpend.before_qty , mexpend.lottery_type_id , fillOpen.lottery_fill_open_id , fillOpen.open_number , fillOpen.lottery_fill_creater_date , fillOpen.lottery_fill_end_date , fillOpen.create_user_id , fillOpen.fill_l_bi , fillOpen.award_l_bi , fillOpen.send_status , fillOpen.lottery_fill_unit_price , fillOpen.lottery_type_id , fillOpen.lottery_fill_name , fillOpen.lottery_stage FROM manifest_expend AS mexpend JOIN lottery_fill_open AS fillOpen ON mexpend.lottery_type_id=fillOpen.lottery_type_id
ORDER BY mexpend.create_time ASC

SELECT fopen.lottery_fill_open_id AS fillOpenId, fopen.lottery_fill_creater_date AS fillCreateDate, fopen.fill_l_bi, fopen.award_l_bi, fopen.lottery_fill_name AS fillName, fopen.lottery_stage, fdoc.doc_no, fdoc.create_time, fuser.lottery_fill_buy_qty AS buyQty, fopen.lottery_fill_unit_price AS unit, fuser.lottery_fill_buy_qty * fopen.lottery_fill_unit_price AS payMoney FROM manifest_expend AS fdoc INNER JOIN lottery_fill_open AS fopen ON fdoc.lottery_type_id = fopen.lottery_type_id INNER JOIN lottery_fill_user AS fuser ON fdoc.user_id = fuser.user_id AND fdoc.lottery_id = fuser.lottery_fill_user_id
fdoc.doc_no = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fdoc.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
